action.text: Without objection, the Chair laid before the House H. Res. 920.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary:
This resolution further extends the following dates in H.Res. 891, as amended by H.Res. 911 through
the legislative day of May 3, 2020, by which certain proceedings may take place in the House; the calendar day of May 3, 2020, the authority of the Speaker of the House to suspend the rules; and the legislative day of May 4, 2020, provisions waiving a specified requirement of Rule XIII (Calendar and Committee Reports) to allow consideration of resolutions reported from the Committee on Rules through such legislative day, on the same day they are presented to the House.
